inclusion.criterion: participate in regular in person visits to the Jefferson Diabetes Research Center
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 18 years of age before starting the protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: never used an insulin pump before
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: immediately going to initiate insulin pump therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: unwilling to perform at least 4 blood glucose self-tests
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and is currently homeless, but appears well with no nausea or vomiting.
